verses.verse: <S%H1945>Ho,<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> one that <S%H6771>thirsts,<s%> <S%H3212>come<s%> you to the <S%H4325>waters,<s%> and he that has <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H3701>money;<s%> <S%H3212>come<s%> you, <S%H7666>buy,<s%> and <S%H398>eat;<s%> yes, <S%H3212>come,<s%> <S%H7666>buy<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> and <S%H2461>milk<s%> <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> and <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H4242>price.<s%>

<S%H4100>Why<s%> do you <S%H8254>spend<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> for that which is not <S%H3899>bread?<s%> and your <S%H3018>labor<s%> for that which <S%H7654>satisfies<s%> not? <S%H8085>listen<s%> diligently to me, and <S%H398>eat<s%> you that which is <S%H2896>good,<s%> and let your <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H6026>delight<s%> itself in <S%H1880>fatness.<s%>

<S%H5186>Incline<s%> your <S%H241>ear,<s%> and <S%H3212>come<s%> to me: <S%H8085>hear,<s%> and your <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall <S%H2421>live;<s%> and I will <S%H3772>make<s%> an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with you, even the <S%H539>sure<s%> <S%H2617>mercies<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%>
<S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> him for a <S%H5707>witness<s%> to the <S%H3816>people,<s%> a <S%H5057>leader<s%> and <S%H6680>commander<s%> to the <S%H3816>people.<s%>

<S%H2005>Behold,<s%> you shall <S%H7121>call<s%> a <S%H1471>nation<s%> that you <S%H3045>know<s%> not, and <S%H1471>nations<s%> that <S%H3045>knew<s%> not you shall <S%H7323>run<s%> to you <S%H4616>because<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and for the <S%H6918>Holy<s%> One of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> for he has <S%H6286>glorified<s%> you.
<S%H1875>Seek<s%> you the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> while he may be <S%H4672>found,<s%> <S%H7121>call<s%> you on him while he is <S%H7138>near:<s%>

Let the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H5800>forsake<s%> his <S%H1870>way,<s%> and the <S%H205>unrighteous<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H4284>thoughts:<s%> and let him <S%H7725>return<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and he will have <S%H7355>mercy<s%> on him; and to our <S%H430>God,<s%> for he will <S%H7235>abundantly<s%> <S%H5545>pardon.<s%>
For my <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> are not your <S%H4284>thoughts,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> are your <S%H1870>ways<s%> my <S%H1870>ways,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

For as the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> are <S%H1361>higher<s%> than the <S%H776>earth,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> are my <S%H1870>ways<s%> <S%H1361>higher<s%> than your <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and my <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> than your <S%H4284>thoughts.<s%>

For as the <S%H1653>rain<s%> <S%H3381>comes<s%> <S%H3381>down,<s%> and the <S%H7950>snow<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H7725>returns<s%> not <S%H8033>thither,<s%> but <S%H7301>waters<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and makes it <S%H3205>bring<s%> <S%H3205>forth<s%> and <S%H6779>bud,<s%> that it may <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%> to the <S%H2232>sower,<s%> and <S%H3899>bread<s%> to the <S%H398>eater:<s%>

<S%H3651>So<s%> shall my <S%H1697>word<s%> be that <S%H3318>goes<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of my <S%H6310>mouth:<s%> it shall not <S%H7725>return<s%> to me <S%H7387>void,<s%> but it shall <S%H6213>accomplish<s%> that <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H2654>please,<s%> and it shall <S%H6743>prosper<s%> in the thing <S%H834>whereto<s%> I <S%H7971>sent<s%> it.

For you shall <S%H3318>go<s%> out with <S%H8057>joy,<s%> and be <S%H2986>led<s%> <S%H2986>forth<s%> with <S%H7965>peace:<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> and the <S%H1389>hills<s%> shall <S%H6476>break<s%> forth <S%H6440>before<s%> you into <S%H7440>singing,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> shall <S%H4222>clap<s%> their <S%H3709>hands.<s%>

<S%H8478>Instead<s%> of the <S%H5285>thorn<s%> shall <S%H5927>come<s%> up the <S%H1265>fir<s%> tree, and <S%H8478>instead<s%> of the <S%H5636>brier<s%> shall <S%H5927>come<s%> up the <S%H1918>myrtle<s%> tree: and it shall be to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> for a <S%H8034>name,<s%> for an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H226>sign<s%> that shall not be <S%H3772>cut<s%> off.
